attributes.action: Honour Kenny dalglish with a knighthood.
attributes.background: Kenny Dalglish is a man who scaled the heights of European football and achieved multiple success as both player and manager. Dalglish also honourably helped the fight for justice for the 96, a fight that after 27 painful years was finally won.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
